languages.text: "Я угрожал власти Теодоры, и она приказала выпотрошить мой мозг. Изощренное наказание — я унижен и страдаю, но в то же время служу династии и совершенно безобиден. Впитывай, отпрыск — вот кара, достойная Вольного Торговца".

"I was a threat to Theodora's rule, and she had my brain dissected. A sophisticated sentence — to be humiliated, to live in suffering, yet continue to serve the dynasty, perfectly harmless. Absorb this lesson, offspring — that is how a Rogue Trader metes out punishment."
languages.original_text: "Я угрожал власти Теодоры, и она приказала выпотрошить мой мозг. Изощренное наказание — я унижен и страдаю, но в то же время служу династии и совершенно безобиден. Впитывай, отпрыск — вот кара, достойная Вольного Торговца".

"I was a threat to Theodora's rule, and she had my brain dissected. A sophisticated sentence — to be humiliated, to live in suffering, yet continue to serve the dynasty, perfectly harmless. Absorb this lesson, offspring — that is how a Rogue Trader metes out punishment."

languages.text: «Era una amenaza para el gobierno de Theodora, así que hizo que diseccionaran mi cerebro. Una sentencia sofisticada: me humilló, me hizo sufrir y me obligó a seguir sirviendo a la dinastía sin presentar ningún peligro. Aprende la lección, descendiente: así deben ser los castigos de los Comerciantes Independientes».
languages.original_text: "I was a threat to Theodora's rule, and she had my brain dissected. A sophisticated sentence — to be humiliated, to live in suffering, yet continue to serve the dynasty, perfectly harmless. Absorb this lesson, offspring — that is how a Rogue Trader metes out punishment."

traits.locale_text: «Era una amenaza para el gobierno de Theodora, así que hizo que diseccionaran mi cerebro. Una sentencia sofisticada: me humilló, me hizo sufrir y me obligó a seguir sirviendo a la dinastía sin presentar ningún peligro. Aprende la lección, descendiente: así deben ser los castigos de los Comerciantes Independientes».

languages.text: “因为我对西奥多拉的统治构成了威胁，于是她把我的大脑解剖了。那是个复杂的过程，我蒙受了羞辱，在痛苦中挣扎，但却会继续为王朝服务，不会构成任何威胁。吸取这个教训吧，孩子，这才是行商浪人惩罚别人的方式。”
languages.original_text: "I was a threat to Theodora's rule, and she had my brain dissected. A sophisticated sentence — to be humiliated, to live in suffering, yet continue to serve the dynasty, perfectly harmless. Absorb this lesson, offspring — that is how a Rogue Trader metes out punishment."

traits.locale_text: “因为我对西奥多拉的统治构成了威胁，于是她把我的大脑解剖了。那是个复杂的过程，我蒙受了羞辱，在痛苦中挣扎，但却会继续为王朝服务，不会构成任何威胁。吸取这个教训吧，孩子，这才是行商浪人惩罚别人的方式。”

languages.text: 「私はシオドーラの支配にとって脅威だったため、彼女は私の脳を解剖させた。洗練された処罰だった。屈辱を与え、苦しみの中を生きながらえさせ、王朝に奉仕させ続け、完璧に無害な状態にするという処罰だ。この教訓を学ぶのだ、我が子よ―これがローグトレーダーのやり方だ」
languages.original_text: "I was a threat to Theodora's rule, and she had my brain dissected. A sophisticated sentence — to be humiliated, to live in suffering, yet continue to serve the dynasty, perfectly harmless. Absorb this lesson, offspring — that is how a Rogue Trader metes out punishment."

traits.locale_text: 「私はシオドーラの支配にとって脅威だったため、彼女は私の脳を解剖させた。洗練された処罰だった。屈辱を与え、苦しみの中を生きながらえさせ、王朝に奉仕させ続け、完璧に無害な状態にするという処罰だ。この教訓を学ぶのだ、我が子よ―これがローグトレーダーのやり方だ」

languages.text: "Ich war eine Gefahr für Theodoras Herrschaft, also ließ sie mein Gehirn präparieren. Eine teuflische Bestrafung ... ich wurde gedemütigt und musste der Dynastie dennoch weiter dienen ... absolut harmlos. Merkt Euch diese Lektion, Sprössling ... so bestraft {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "I was a threat to Theodora's rule, and she had my brain dissected. A sophisticated sentence — to be humiliated, to live in suffering, yet continue to serve the dynasty, perfectly harmless. Absorb this lesson, offspring — that is how a Rogue Trader metes out punishment."

traits.locale_text: "Ich war eine Gefahr für Theodoras Herrschaft, also ließ sie mein Gehirn präparieren. Eine teuflische Bestrafung ... ich wurde gedemütigt und musste der Dynastie dennoch weiter dienen ... absolut harmlos. Merkt Euch diese Lektion, Sprössling ... so bestraft {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}."

languages.text: « Je représentais une menace pour le règne de Théodora, et elle a ordonné qu'on me dissèque le cerveau. Une sentence des plus sophistiquées... Condamné aux pires humiliations, réduit à l'impuissance et à une vie de souffrance au service de la dynastie. Retenez bien la leçon, rejeton, tel est le genre de châtiments que les libres-marchands se plaisent à infliger. »
languages.original_text: "I was a threat to Theodora's rule, and she had my brain dissected. A sophisticated sentence — to be humiliated, to live in suffering, yet continue to serve the dynasty, perfectly harmless. Absorb this lesson, offspring — that is how a Rogue Trader metes out punishment."

traits.locale_text: « Je représentais une menace pour le règne de Théodora, et elle a ordonné qu'on me dissèque le cerveau. Une sentence des plus sophistiquées... Condamné aux pires humiliations, réduit à l'impuissance et à une vie de souffrance au service de la dynastie. Retenez bien la leçon, rejeton, tel est le genre de châtiments que les libres-marchands se plaisent à infliger. »

languages.text: "Theodora'nın hükmü için tehdit oluşturuyordum, o da beynimi kestirip parçalattı. Aşağılanmam, acı çekmem ama bu sırada hanedanlığa hizmete devam etmemi sağlayacak sofistike bir ceza. Bunu not et zürriyet. Hür Tacir dediğin böyle ceza verir."
languages.original_text: "I was a threat to Theodora's rule, and she had my brain dissected. A sophisticated sentence — to be humiliated, to live in suffering, yet continue to serve the dynasty, perfectly harmless. Absorb this lesson, offspring — that is how a Rogue Trader metes out punishment."
